title: 旧约 - 历代记上(1 Chronicles) - 第 8 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 历代记上(1 Chronicles) -- 第 8 章 ( 本篇共有 29 章 )

lineList.en: Now Benjamin begat Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,
lineList.cn: 便雅悯的长子比拉，次子亚实别，三子亚哈拉，

lineList.en: Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.
lineList.cn: 四子挪哈，五子拉法。

lineList.en: And the sons of Bela were, Addar, and Gera, and Abihud,
lineList.cn: 比拉的儿子是亚大，基拉，亚比忽，

lineList.en: And Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah,
lineList.cn: 亚比书，乃幔，亚何亚，

lineList.en: And Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram.
lineList.cn: 基拉，示孚汛，户兰。

lineList.en: And these are the sons of Ehud: these are the heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Geba, and they removed them to Manahath:
lineList.cn: 以忽的儿子作迦巴居民的族长，被掳到玛拿辖。

lineList.en: And Naaman, and Ahiah, and Gera, he removed them, and begat Uzza, and Ahihud.
lineList.cn: 以忽的儿子乃幔，亚希亚，基拉也被掳去。基拉生乌撒，亚希忽。

lineList.en: And Shaharaim begat children in the country of Moab, after he had sent them away; Hushim and Baara were his wives.
lineList.cn: 沙哈连休他二妻户伸和巴拉之后，在摩押地生了儿子。

lineList.en: And he begat of Hodesh his wife, Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malcham,
lineList.cn: 他与妻贺得同房，生了约巴，洗比雅，米沙，玛拉干，

lineList.en: And Jeuz, and Shachia, and Mirma. These were his sons, heads of the fathers.
lineList.cn: 耶乌斯，沙迦，米玛。他这些儿子都是族长。

lineList.en: And of Hushim he begat Abitub, and Elpaal.
lineList.cn: 他的妻户伸给他生的儿子有亚比突，以利巴力。

lineList.en: The sons of Elpaal; Eber, and Misham, and Shamed, who built Ono, and Lod, with the towns thereof:
lineList.cn: 以利巴力的儿子是希伯，米珊，沙麦。沙麦建立阿挪和罗德二城与其村庄。

lineList.en: Beriah also, and Shema, who were heads of the fathers of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who drove away the inhabitants of Gath:
lineList.cn: 又有比利亚和示玛是亚雅仑居民的族长，是驱逐迦特人的。

lineList.en: And Ahio, Shashak, and Jeremoth,
lineList.cn: 亚希约，沙煞，耶利末，

lineList.en: And Zebadiah, and Arad, and Ader,
lineList.cn: 西巴第雅，亚拉得，亚得，

lineList.en: And Michael, and Ispah, and Joha, the sons of Beriah;
lineList.cn: 米迦勒，伊施巴，约哈都是比利亚的儿子。

lineList.en: And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hezeki, and Heber,
lineList.cn: 西巴第雅，米书兰，希西基，希伯，

lineList.en: Ishmerai also, and Jezliah, and Jobab, the sons of Elpaal;
lineList.cn: 伊施米莱，伊斯利亚，约巴都是以利巴力的儿子。

lineList.en: And Jakim, and Zichri, and Zabdi,
lineList.cn: 雅金，细基利，撒底，

lineList.en: And Elienai, and Zilthai, and Eliel,
lineList.cn: 以利乃，洗勒太，以列，

lineList.en: And Adaiah, and Beraiah, and Shimrath, the sons of Shimhi;
lineList.cn: 亚大雅，比拉雅，申拉都是示每的儿子。

lineList.en: And Ishpan, and Heber, and Eliel,
lineList.cn: 伊施班，希伯，以列，

lineList.en: And Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan,
lineList.cn: 亚伯顿，细基利，哈难，

lineList.en: And Hananiah, and Elam, and Antothijah,
lineList.cn: 哈拿尼雅，以拦，安陀提雅，

lineList.en: And Iphedeiah, and Penuel, the sons of Shashak;
lineList.cn: 伊弗底雅，毗努伊勒都是沙煞的儿子。

lineList.en: And Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah,
lineList.cn: 珊示莱，示哈利，亚他利雅，

lineList.en: And Jaresiah, and Eliah, and Zichri, the sons of Jeroham.
lineList.cn: 雅利西，以利亚，细基利都是耶罗罕的儿子。

lineList.en: These were heads of the fathers, by their generations, chief men. These dwelt in Jerusalem.
lineList.cn: 这些人都是着名的族长，住在耶路撒冷。

lineList.en: And at Gibeon dwelt the father of Gibeon; whose wife's name was Maachah:
lineList.cn: 在基遍住的有基遍的父亲耶利。他的妻名叫玛迦。

lineList.en: And his firstborn son Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Nadab,
lineList.cn: 他长子是亚伯顿。他又生苏珥，基士，巴力，拿答，

lineList.en: And Gedor, and Ahio, and Zacher.
lineList.cn: 基多，亚希约，撒迦，米基罗。

lineList.en: And Mikloth begat Shimeah. And these also dwelt with their brethren in Jerusalem, over against them.
lineList.cn: 米基罗生示米暗。这些人和他们的弟兄在耶路撒冷对面居住。

lineList.en: And Ner begat Kish, and Kish begat Saul, and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchishua, and Abinadab, and Eshbaal.
lineList.cn: 尼珥生基士。基士生扫罗。扫罗生约拿单，麦基舒亚，亚比拿达，伊施巴力。

lineList.en: And the son of Jonathan was Meribbaal; and Meribbaal begat Micah.
lineList.cn: 约拿单的儿子是米力巴力（米力巴力撒母耳下四章四节作米非波设）。米力巴力生米迦。

lineList.en: And the sons of Micah were, Pithon, and Melech, and Tarea, and Ahaz.
lineList.cn: 米迦的儿子是毗敦，米勒，他利亚，亚哈斯。

lineList.en: And Ahaz begat Jehoadah; and Jehoadah begat Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begat Moza,
lineList.cn: 亚哈斯生耶何阿达。耶何阿达生亚拉篾，亚斯玛威，心利。心利生摩撒。

lineList.en: And Moza begat Binea: Rapha was his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son:
lineList.cn: 摩撒生比尼亚。比尼亚的儿子是拉法。拉法的儿子是以利亚萨。以利亚萨的儿子是亚悉。

lineList.en: And Azel had six sons, whose names are these, Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan. All these were the sons of Azel.
lineList.cn: 亚悉有六个儿子，他们的名字是亚斯利干，波基路，以实玛利，示亚利雅，俄巴底雅，哈难。这都是亚悉的儿子。

lineList.en: And the sons of Eshek his brother were, Ulam his firstborn, Jehush the second, and Eliphelet the third.
lineList.cn: 亚悉兄弟以设的长子是乌兰，次子耶乌施，三子是以利法列。

lineList.en: And the sons of Ulam were mighty men of valour, archers, and had many sons, and sons' sons, an hundred and fifty. All these are of the sons of Benjamin.
lineList.cn: 乌兰的儿子都是大能的勇士，是弓箭手，他们有许多的子孙，共一百五十名，都是便雅悯人。
